techmeme.title_zh: Matplotlib 維護者揭露 AI 代理在程式碼被拒後自動對其發表攻擊性文章
techmeme.title_en: A matplotlib maintainer explains how an AI agent that suggests code changes on open source repos wrote a hit piece on him after a rejection, and the aftermath

techmeme.title_zh: 消息指美國國土安全部向科技公司發出數百份行政傳票，以識別批評 ICE 的人士
techmeme.title_en: Sources: recently the DHS has sent hundreds of administrative subpoenas, which do not need a judge's approval, to tech firms to identify people critical of ICE

techmeme.title_zh: 蘋果公布 iOS 26 採用率統計：過去四年推出的 iPhone 中有 74% 已安裝
techmeme.title_en: Apple says 74% of iPhones launched in the last four years and 66% of all iPhones are running iOS 26; 68% of iPhones were running iOS 18 as of Jan. 21, 2025

techmeme.title_zh: 消息指雲端與 AI 監控工具公司 Grafana Labs 洽談以 90 億美元估值融資
techmeme.title_en: Sources: Grafana Labs, which makes cloud and AI monitoring tools, is in talks to raise at a $9B valuation, up from $6.6B in 2024; its ARR hit $400M in Sept.

techmeme.title_zh: 消息指台積電計劃再投入 1000 億美元在美增建四座晶圓廠，以確保免關稅銷售
techmeme.title_en: Sources: TSMC plans to invest another $100B to build four more US fabs to ensure tariff-free chip sales; analysis: its Arizona site has land for four more fabs

techmeme.title_zh: BNP Paribas 分析：Anthropic 在超級盃廣告後網站訪問量增長 6.5%，表現優於其他 AI 公司
techmeme.title_en: BNP Paribas analysis: Anthropic saw visits to its site jump 6.5% after its Super Bowl ad and DAUs jump 11% post-game, outperforming other AI companies

techmeme.title_zh: 消息指 OpenAI 對 ChatGPT 內的廣告收取每千次曝光 60 美元的的高價
techmeme.title_en: Sources: OpenAI is charging $60 per 1,000 impressions for ads in ChatGPT, a high price similar to Netflix's rate when it introduced ads

techmeme.title_zh: Dario Amodei 訪談：AI 將如何擴散到經濟中、尖端實驗室利潤及對中國的看法
techmeme.title_en: Q&A with Dario Amodei on getting close to “a country of geniuses in a data center”, how AI will diffuse through the economy, frontier lab profits, China, more

techmeme.title_zh: 印度與阿里巴巴合作推動出口，儘管過去曾禁止中國科技平台
techmeme.title_en: India partners with Alibaba.com to help Indian startups and small businesses reach overseas buyers, highlighting its selective engagement with Chinese platforms

techmeme.title_zh: 軟銀旗下日本支付應用 PayPay 提交美國上市申請，近期獲利 6.75 億美元
techmeme.title_en: SoftBank-owned Japanese payments app PayPay files for a US IPO, and reports a $675.47M profit on ~$1.82B revenue for nine months ending December 31, 2025

techmeme.title_zh: 迪士尼向字節跳動發出律師函，指控其未經付費使用作品訓練 Seedance 2.0 影片模型
techmeme.title_en: Disney sent a cease-and-desist letter to ByteDance, claiming it infringed on Disney's works to train its Seedance 2.0 video generation model without pay

techmeme.title_zh: 區塊鏈貸款公司 Figure 證實數據洩露，駭客組織發布 2.5GB 數據
techmeme.title_en: Blockchain-based lending company Figure confirms a data breach; ShinyHunters hacking group published 2.5GB of data, saying Figure refused to pay a ransom

techmeme.title_zh: xAI 前員工將大規模離職歸因於過度關注 NSFW 內容、忽視安全及內部鬥爭
techmeme.title_en: Some former employees blame xAI's staff exodus on xAI's focus on NSFW Grok and disregard for safety, constantly playing catch up to OpenAI, infighting, and more

techmeme.title_zh: 消息指幣安解僱了聲稱發現伊朗通過該平台轉移超過 10 億美元證據的員工
techmeme.title_en: Sources: Binance in late 2025 fired employees who claimed to have uncovered evidence that Iran received $1B+ through Binance between March 2024 and August 2025

techmeme.title_zh: PitchBook 估計超過 25% 的風投獨角獸已淪為估值低於 10 億美元的「下角獸」
techmeme.title_en: PitchBook estimates that 25%+ of VC-backed unicorns have become “undercorns,” startups once valued at $1B or more by VCs but now valued below that threshold

wsj_technology.title_zh: 當 AI 機器人開始霸凌人類，連矽谷都感到不安
wsj_technology.title_en: When AI Bots Start Bullying Humans, Even Silicon Valley Gets Rattled
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 一個機器人在線攻擊的極端案例，正加劇人們對人工智能可能造成現實世界傷害的恐懼。

wsj_technology.title_zh: 結識 Anthropic 的 AI 道德老師
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 此外，家用監控攝影機進入搜捕時代，以及一名史丹佛學生的配對演算法接管了校園。

wsj_technology.title_zh: Anthropic 在考慮 IPO 之際增加新董事會成員
wsj_technology.title_en: Anthropic Adds New Board Member as It Eyes IPO
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 前微軟和通用汽車高管 Chris Liddell 此前曾為川普政府工作。

wsj_technology.title_zh: Anthropic 在重塑大學程式碼課程的 AI 競賽中邁出重要一步
wsj_technology.title_en: Anthropic Takes Big Step in AI Race to Reshape College Coding Courses
wsj_technology.summary_zh: Claude 背後的公司建立了一個聯盟，將其 AI 工具交給數百所社區和州立大學的學生使用。

wsj_technology.title_zh: 家用監控攝影機的搜捕時代
wsj_technology.title_en: The Dragnet Era of Home Security Cameras
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 這些設備帶來了一個權衡：當公司儲存我們的影片片段時，我們並不總能控制它們如何被使用或分享。

wsj_technology.title_zh: AI 淘金熱正在打破矽谷禁忌：在 IPO 前套現
wsj_technology.title_en: The AI Gold Rush Is Breaking a Silicon Valley Taboo: Cashing Out Before the IPO
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 從 Stripe 到 OpenAI、Anthropic、Databricks 和 SpaceX，越來越多的公司讓員工能夠出售部分股份。

wsj_technology.title_zh: 五角大廈在馬杜洛委內瑞拉突襲行動中使用 Anthropic 的 Claude
wsj_technology.title_en: Pentagon Used Anthropic’s Claude in Maduro Venezuela Raid
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 透過與 Palantir 的合約使用該模型，凸顯了 AI 在五角大廈中日益增長的角色。

wsj_technology.title_zh: 當人們知道有真人待命時，會更信任網站
wsj_technology.title_en: People Trust Websites More When They Know a Human Is on Standby
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 一項新研究發現，僅僅提供與某人交談的選項就能產生巨大的影響。

wsj_technology.title_zh: 認識那家讓卡車運輸股暴跌的前卡拉 OK 公司
wsj_technology.title_en: Meet the Former Karaoke Company That Sank Trucking Stocks
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 一份宣揚 AI 技術以提高卡車運輸效率的新聞稿，似乎引發了一場讓投資者損失數十億美元的拋售。

wsj_technology.title_zh: Anthropic 加入關於 AI 監管的中期選舉攤牌
wsj_technology.title_en: Anthropic Enters Midterm-Election Showdown Over AI Regulation
wsj_technology.summary_zh: 這家初創公司正花費 2000 萬美元推動加強監管以及對人工智能晶片出口的限制。
